headline: Ask HN: Programming Challenge for Network Servers?
description:
I'm thinking of running a network server programming challenge. Kind of like a year-round Advent of Code, but for networking instead of algorithms. Something like:

* You are given a network protocol spec.

* You implement the server and input its IP address and port number.

* Your server is automatically tested.

* Once all tests pass, your solve time goes onto a global leaderboard.

* New puzzle every ~2 weeks.

* They start easy and get harder.

If you would like to register your interest please put your email address in here: https://incoherency.co.uk/server-programming/

I'm also interested to hear your thoughts on potential pitfalls and drawbacks.

Cheers!
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 网络服务器的编程挑战？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 網絡服務器的編程挑戰？
description_zh-Hans:
我正在考虑举办一个网络服务器编程挑战赛。有点像全年的 "代码降临"，但是是网络而不是算法。

* 给你一个网络协议规格。

* 你实现服务器并输入它的IP地址和端口号。

* 你的服务器被自动测试。

* 一旦所有测试通过，你的解题时间将进入全球排行榜。

* 它们开始时很容易，后来越来越难。

如果你想注册你的兴趣，请把你的电子邮件地址放在这里：https://incoherency.co.uk/server-programming/

我也很想听听你对潜在的陷阱和缺点的看法。

欢呼吧!

如果你想註冊你的興趣，請把你的電子郵件地址放在這裡：https://incoherency.co.uk/server-programming/
